text: As a physician legislator, I will never stop fighting for patient safety. That's why I will continue to call for the safe repair and maintenance of medical devices. https://t.co/PrkfogFXAn

Nearly 520,000 rural Pennsylvanians live without fast and reliable internet access. I'm proud to lead the Extending America's Spectrum Auction Leadership Act to help connect families and businesses to the internet services they need. https://t.co/R7HBshPRRh

Great to spend time this morning with the American Academy of Dermatology during their visit to Washington. 

As the only dermatologist in Congress, I will continue working to make skin cancer prevention a top priority. https://t.co/F7vuAnaOp9

During National EMS week, we recognize the work done by our EMTs and Paramedics to care for the sick and injured. These frontline medical workers are key to keeping our communities healthy and safe. https://t.co/hwy3t2rbc5

As gas prices reach a record high, President Biden is continuing to cancel new oil and natural gas leases. This disastrous policy will only make things harder for American families who are struggling with rising prices. https://t.co/ZxnmHi6FMU

This Sunday, we remember the words of Matthew 5:9: "Blessed are the peacemakers." 
On this National Peace Officers Memorial Day, we recognize the sacrifices that officers make to protect our communities. https://t.co/Dy05gVkWk2
By failing to act in a timely manner the Biden Administration and the FDA are failing our nation's children. https://t.co/QVMmWYd2lP
It's time for President Biden to address the baby formula shortage that Pennsylvania families with young children are facing. https://t.co/ylu6OSxvGk

Great to be with members of our law enforcement this morning for the Back the Blue bike ride. Across Pennsylvania, our police officers work tirelessly to keep our communities safe. https://t.co/dL7dwfm8If
